document.full_text: jimmie johnson beat clint bowyer by 0.002 of a second to capture the aaron's 499. it was tied for the closest finish in nascar sprint cup history.
document.title: roundup: johnson wins at talladega by smallest of margins
lines_and_colors: jimmie johnson beat clint bowyer by 0.002 of a second to capture the aaron's 499. it was tied for the closest finish in nascar sprint cup history.
